spell_tooltip.description: Reduces the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon by 50% and its duration by 25%.
All enemies within 8 yards slowly decay, losing up to 3% of their max health every 2 sec. Max 5 stacks. Lasts 6 sec.
Death Strike reduces all Physical damage taken by 25% for 4 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 315,970 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Death's Advance grants an additional 25% movement speed over the first 3 sec.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 40% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Lifts the enemy target off the ground, crushing their throat with dark energy and stunning them for 5 sec.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Leech by 3%.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 281,743 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 8% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 860,909 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 132,724 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec, plus 2 Runic Power per additional enemy struck.

Smash the target, dealing 148,329 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 71,995. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Deals 165,526 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 Blood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 246,604 health from the target over 12 sec.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 40% for 14 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 71,995. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Vampiric Blood's healing and absorb amount is increased by 10% and duration by 4 sec.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
Heart Strike generates 2 additional Runic Power per target hit.
Each charge of Bone Shield increases your maximum health by 1%.

Summons a rune weapon for 14 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.
Each enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.
While Crimson Scourge is active, your next Death and Decay heals you for 35,762 health per Bone Shield charge and you immediately gain 10 Runic Power.
Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 15 yards of a hostile or friendly target, pulling them to the target's location.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates 5 Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 5 sec.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage 15% more often.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.
Gorefiend's Grasp cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and it now also Silences enemies for 3 sec.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.
Summons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 6 sec.
Death Strike's healing is increased by 15% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take 5% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by 25% for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain 6 Runic Power and absorb damage equal to 6% of your maximum health for 8 sec.

Parrying an attack grants you a charge of Bloodied Blade, increasing your Strength by 0.5%, up to 4.0% for 15 sec.

At 8 stacks, your next parry consumes all charges to unleash a Heart Strike at 300% effectiveness, and increases your Strength by 10% for 6 sec.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing 8,386 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by 20%.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by 2 sec and it absorbs 20% more damage.

Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges to create a whirl of bone and gore that batters all nearby enemies, dealing 66,518 Shadow damage every 1 sec, and healing you for 2% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to 10%). Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lasts 2 sec per Bone Shield charge spent and rapidly regenerates a Bone Shield every 1 sec.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 4 min.
While Blood Shield is active, you deal 25% increased Physical damage.

Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 343,374 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 32,749 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 194,248 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.
Blood Plague deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Blood Plague.

Blood Boil deals 10% increased damage, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 10% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

Reaper's Mark initial strike grants 3 charges of Bone Shield.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health.

When you suffer a damaging effect equal to 25% of your maximum health, you instantly cast Death Pact at 50% effectiveness. May only occur every 2 min.

When a Reaper's Mark explodes, the cooldowns of this effect and Death Pact are reduced by 5 sec.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.
Reduces the cooldown of Reaper's Mark by 15 sec, but the amount of Marrowrends empowered by Exterminate is reduced by 1.
When an enemy deals direct damage to your Anti-Magic Shell, their cast speed is reduced by 10% for 6 sec.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 1 Marrowrend cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 825,800 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 439,428 Shadowfrost damage and applies Blood Plague. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 309,417 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Your ghoul's attacks have a chance to apply Enfeeble, reducing the enemies movement speed by 30% and the damage they deal to you by 12% for 6 sec.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.

Strike an enemy for 104,465 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 483,471 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.

Strikes for 324,042 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 56,338 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.
An unholy strike that deals 173,207 Physical damage and 94,571 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your ghoul deals 103,608 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. The ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 20%.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 74,680 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Bring doom upon the enemy, dealing 117,770 Shadow damage and bursting up to 4 Festering Wounds on the target.

Summons 4 Army of the Dead ghouls for 20 sec.

Generates 2 Runes.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur 100% more quickly for 10 sec.
Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.
Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 5%.
Death Coil deals 15% additional damage and seeks out 1 additional nearby enemy.
Dark Transformation creates an unholy pact between you and your pet, igniting flaming chains that deal 526,948 Shadow damage over 15 sec to enemies between you and your pet.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Death Coil causes the target to take an additional 30% of the direct damage dealt over 4 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 317,411 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Death's Advance grants an additional 25% movement speed over the first 3 sec.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.

Strike an enemy for 106,816 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 483,471 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Anti-Magic Shell increases healing received by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Anti-Magic shell now removes all harmful magical effects when activated, but it's cooldown is increased by 20  sec.
Chill your weapon with icy power and quickly strike the enemy, dealing 296,571 Frost damage.
A brutal attack that deals 362,630 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 51,203 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever
A disease that deals 393,914 Frost damage over 12 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate critically strike.
Remorseless Winter deals 6% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.
Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by 2% for 10 sec, stacks up to 3 times.
Increases your maximum Runic Power by 20.
Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.
Increases Obliterate damage by 10%.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 35%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.
Obliterate has a 15% increased chance to trigger Rime and Howling Blast generates 6 Runic Power while Rime is active.
Blow the Horn of Winter, gaining 2 Runes and generating 25 Runic Power.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Each time Frost Fever deals damage, 15% of the damage dealt is gathered into the next cast of Remorseless Winter, up to 20 times.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 53,313 Frost damage.
When empowered by Rime, Howling Blast deals 60% increased damage to your primary target.
Your Runic Power spending abilities have a chance to additionally deal 45% of the damage dealt over 4 sec.
